DOC.brief_title: Efficacy , Safety Tolerability XBD173 Patients With Generalized Anxiety Disorder
DOC.criteria: Current doctor 's diagnosis generalize anxiety disorder In need psychiatric treatment Willingness complete aspect study Current doctor 's diagnosis major depression History schizophrenia schizoaffective disorder Drug dependence within 2 month prior study start For detailed information eligibility , please contact study center near ( see ) , call 18627788300 , visit follow website : www.novartisclinicaltrials.com
